description: React functional component 'Board' rendering a 3x3 grid of 'Square' components for a Tic Tac Toe game, handling user interaction and accessibility features.

methods.name: Board({ squares, onPlaySquare, isGameOver })
methods.description: React functional component that displays a grid of squares, managing the rendering of each cell and handling user interactions.

ctags.name: Board
ctags.pattern: /^export default function Board({ squares, onPlaySquare, isGameOver }) {$/

ctags.name: styles
ctags.pattern: /^    <div className={styles.board} role="grid" aria-label="Tic Tac Toe board">$/

fields.name: <div className={styles.board} role="grid" aria-label="Tic Tac Toe board">
